# golbat

> metadata inspector for developers - see how your links appear on social platforms before sharing

## about

golbat is a free, open-source tool that lets developers inspect and preview link metadata (Open Graph tags, Twitter Cards, etc.) across multiple platforms including Telegram, Discord, Slack, X/Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and WhatsApp.

## features

- live previews for 7 platforms
- metadata quality score
- ai-powered analysis
- copy as html/json
- image dimension validation
- keyboard shortcuts (1-7)
- url history
- dark mode

## links

- website: https://golb.at
- github: https://github.com/visible/golbat

## stack

next.js, typescript, tailwind, vercel ai sdk

## creator

visible (https://github.com/visible)

mit
